resources.string:
1. The Game starts in Landscape position. 
 2. The ball moves towards the sides of the wall. 
 3. The player has to rebound the ball as it just touches the wall. 
 4. To Rebound the ball, the player has to tap one of the two switch on the keyboard/controller. 
 5. The aim is to act fast and just on time. 
 6. You loose points as you progress in the game. 
 7. The first one to loose all the points looses the game.
